text.div:
Dengue Virus Infection (Tests for dengue virus Antigen)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    31798-2 Dengue virus Ag [Presence] in Serum
    31799-0 Dengue virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    6384-2 Dengue virus Ag [Presence] in Serum by Immunofluorescence
    6385-9 Dengue virus Ag [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunofluorescence
    75377-2 Dengue virus NS1 Ag [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
    91064-6 Dengue virus NS1 Ag [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
